contest-event.event-date:
June 17, 2018 D Hebden Bridge March Contest
Hebden Bridge March Contest 1 March Contest Hebden Bridge March and Hymn Tune Contest hebden-bridge-march-contest
Hebden Bridge, West Yorkshire (See separate “Hymn tune” result). Combined: 1. Hammonds Saltaire, 98+97 - £400 and the Alan Bottomley Memorial Shield 2. Milnrow, 96+96 - £200 Best Hymn: Hammonds - £50 1st Section: Lindley - £100 2nd Section: Delph - £100 3rd Section: Uppermill - £100 Youth: Elland Silver Youth - £100 Best Youth Instrumentalist: Daniel Clough (Cornet), Elland Silver Youth Best Road March: Yorkshire Imperial DUT - £25 Deportment: Milnrow - £25
June 18, 2018, 10:54 a.m. June 19, 2018, 10:43 a.m.
1 Hammonds Saltaire Morgan Griffiths
2 Milnrow Band Unknown
3 Marsden Silver Prize Band Alan Widdop
4 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Jack Capstaff
